scripts.production: npm run version:bump --silent && rm -f jquery.repeater.min.js && npm run minifyJS --silent && npm run version:add --silent
scripts.version:add: echo "/*! Jquery Repeater!!!!1!11! v - $(npm run version:extract --silent)n * Â© Someone probably n * Build time: $(date '+%m-%d-%Y %H:%M:%S')n */n$(cat jquery.repeater.min.js)" > jquery.repeater.min.js
scripts.version:extract: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]'
